servinfo.title: Precaution of Electric Throttle Control System Calibration
servinfo.ptxt: Completely closed throttle valve position data are stored in ECM.
After performing any one of the following services, it is necessary to calibrate the completely closed throttle valve position stored in ECM.

item.ptxt: Shutting off of backup power for ECM (i.e. disconnection of battery cable, replacement of battery or blown “ECM” fuse)
Clearance of DTC related to electric throttle control system (P0607, P0122, P0123, P0222, P0223, P2100, P2101, P2119, P2122, P2123, P2127, P2128, P2135 or P2138)

servinfo.ptxt: For details of Electric Throttle Control System, refer to Description of Electric Throttle Control System:N32A
